packs.pack_description: Brings back the pre-1.17.30 Minecraft title.
Brings back the old hand-built cobblestone Minecraft logo from the alpha days!
Brings back the classic pixelated Minecraft logo!
Replaces the menu panorama with a dirt background, like in the classic versions of Minecraft. (This will appear on top of the rotating panorama, so any selected menu panorama will not appear).
Changes the foliage textures to those of Alpha Minecraft
Revert all ores to their pre-1.17 textures, including Copper and Deepslate ores.
Reverts Cobblestone to its Alpha texture.
Reverts stripped dark oak to use its pre-1.18 color.
Reverts all planks and signs to their old textures, including modern plank types.
Reverts Gravel to its Alpha texture.
Reverts Netherrack to its old texture, including Ores and Nylium.
Reverts Lava to its Alpha texture. Best with Old Netherrack.
Reverts Ghasts to their lower resolution textures, including Happy Ghasts and their harnesses
Revers Obsidian and Crying Obsidian to their old textures.
Reverts Iron Blocks, Gold Blocks, and Diamond Blocks to their Alpha textures.
Reverts Water to its old texture.
Reverts all Ice blocks to their old textures.
Reverts the texture of Lapis Lazuli Blocks to the Beta texture.
Reverts the texture of Sponges to the beta texture.
Recolors Wool and Carpet to their pre-Java 1.12 colors.
Changes Bed item models to look like regular items (with updated textures) like before 1.12.
Recolors Shulkers and Shulker Boxes to their pre-Java 1.12 colors.
Reverts Spawn Eggs to their classic polka-dot textures
Flattens all Pigs' snouts like they appeared before Beta 1.8
Flattens all Cow and Mooshroom snouts like they appeared before 1.21.70
Changes the texture of the Poppy to the Rose from before Java 1.7.2.
Renames Terracotta back to 'Hardened Clay'.
Renames 'Dirt Path' back to 'Grass Path'.
Renames 'Pottery Sherds' back to 'Pottery Shards'.
Reverts the texture of the purple item tooltip back to the translucent black box
Changes the texture and model of the Zombified Piglin to be closer to the old Zombie Pigman.
Removes the oars from all boat types from their item textures and entity models.
Reverts clouds to their pre-1.21.90 texture
Reverts all door, trapdoor and fence gate sounds to that of before Java 1.0.
Oof!
Brings back the old explosion sounds from Alpha and Beta versions of Minecraft.
Brings back the old level up jingle when you hit increment of 5 XP levels.
Brings back the old potion colors from before 1.19.4.
Gives the Dried Kelp item its texture from previous versions of Minecraft: Bedrock Edition
Reverts the textures of Dyes to their pre-1.21.110 textures
